name: Sea Wind Resort Jamaica

reviews.text: Room was super clean, you're right on the beach, the food was good, beach is very nice, staff very welcoming and accomodating, drink are genuine, if you ask for a pina colada, they dont serve you a slush from a machine that taste like pina colada, they make you the real thing. I even took my girlfriend at the RIU in Negril in december thinking a 5 stars hotel would impress her more, and she asked me to bring her at the Seawind next time we travel in Jamaica since we spent most of our trip there instead of our designated hotel...enough said!
reviews.title: Cant say enough good things about this place

reviews.text: It was about a 1 and 1/2 hour trip from the Montego Bay airport to the hotel. We found hotel room was spacious with two large beds, a fridge, microwave and coffee machine. The bathroom was clean and tidy and the water was nice and hot. The balcony was shared with the next occupants but still comfortable. All the hotel staff were polite and very friendly.

reviews.text: Arrived home after 10 wonderful days in paradise. We are a family of 4 and chose the bed and breakfast option with 2 rooms with adjoining balconies and both rooms had kitchenettes. Rooms were meticulously maintained; we always had what we needed, including beach chairs, beach towels, etc. We were able to experience the real Jamaica and it was well worth it. We always felt safe and thankful to the staff for being like family - especially to our girls - teaching them Dominoes! We went snorkeling with captain Martin (we miss you Martin - get the boat !!!) Parasailing and other activities are right next door. The photos of the hotel already posted really show what Seawind looks like . Seawind is located very close to Couples Swept Away where people spent a fortune to enjoy the same beautiful beach and surroundings that we did - on a budget! After looking at other resorts in the area, we realized that we had one of the most beautiful beach fronts. Thanks to the wonderful Shereta's restaurant staff - Judith, Marcia and Dwight in particular - dining on the beach by candle light is amazing!
reviews.title: Great affordable resort in paradise

reviews.text: Thank you Nathalie and Normand and we look forward to returning next year!
reviews.title: Best vacation ever!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travelled with my husband and six friends and we booked the two beach houses: simply wonderful. The location is excellent: the houses are right on the sand, 30 steps away from the Caribbean sea and have a beautiful front view. Shereta's restaurant is good, Julia from the reception desk made our stay so much easier, Angella gives the best massages in Negril. We had fun, we relaxed (mostly we stayed in the hotel except for a couple of trips: Mayfield Falls is highly recommendable. Don't ever bother visiting Rick's Cafe which is packed with tourists), but the only thing that we didn't like was the "dj" who tortured us constantly with loud and horrible music. Besides from that, thank you Sea Wind for an unforgettable experience!
reviews.title: Great place but...

reviews.title: clean rooms, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I wanted somewhere inexpensive to stay at while at Negril and Sea Wind fit the bill. Not only was the rate great, it was right on the beach. The hotel is small and quaint with a good restaurant. My very picky boyfriend got his meal exactly as he requested and enjoyed it very much. We didn't take the all inclusive since my boyfriend and I love to eat around at different places. The room was spacious with two beds, tv, fridge and coffee maker. Nothing fancy about it but it was clean. The room was a bit warm but once I figured out the air conditioner we were ok. The balcony was a shared one but we didn't have anyone staying in the room next door so we had it all to ourselves. It was nice and quiet allowing me to sleep in while my boyfriend went for a run on the beach. The entire staff was very nice and accommodating. They gave my boyfriend bags of ice so he can ice his knees after his run, and cracked our coconuts open so we could enjoy them on the beach. The area itself was nice, with vendors really not harassing us. We took afternoon naps on the hammock which was very nice.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel

reviews.text: All in all a very nice place to stay. If ever in Negril again, we will definitely visit this hotel again.

aka: Sea Wind Resort Jamaica Hotel Negril
description: A hidden paradise resort located in beautiful Negril, Jamaica. Sea Wind Resort is located only 1h30 min from Montego Bay Airport and directly on Negril's famous 7-miles white sand beach. Only a few steps to the beach, 5 minutes away from all shopping centers, live reggae music and great dance clubs. Our hotel combines incredible ocean views with extreme tranquility so that you can enjoy the beautiful scenery of this Caribbean paradise.
